name: Jeroen Grooten
article: This is a test. If you can read this, welcome to my Database-less Content Management System. The text you are reading right now is written in article.json, parsed through json_decode and written to the page in PHP.

name: Jeroen Grooten
article: This is my second 'article'. This article is also stored in articles.json.
